translations: v．同意，赞成：表示对某个观点、建议或请求的支持和接受。
· The manager assented to the proposal.

sentences.sentence: I assented to the request of the American publishers to write this book.
sentences.translation: 我同意了美国出版商们写这本书的请求。
克拉拉同意了，海蒂开始了。

sentences.sentence: "Oh, I will surely do that," Clara assented.
sentences.translation: “哦，我一定会那么做的。”克拉拉同意了。
